Text.Language: Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con.
Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: Lord have mercy.
Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: يَارَبُّ ارْحَمْ.
Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con.
Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: Have mercy O Lord.
Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: ارحَمنا يا الله.
Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con.
Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: Hear us and have mercy.
Kurie e~le/~con: Kurie e~le/~con: اسمعنا وارحمنا.
